html: The schtick: after studying the material, the subject is intro'd to a fellow student (confederate!). They play Operation while "waiting their turn"…then the "lesson" occurs—in VR. One condition's told they're teaching the peer they met; the other believes they're teaching a bot.

1/  The best product roadmaps tell us:

-What we need to build ✔️
-Why we need to build it ✔️
-How we plan to get it done ✔️

Ruggero Room
Commissioned by William I (1154-66).Showing allegorical emblems of Norman power.A Swabian eagle sits in the centre of the ceiling. Persian and Seljuk influence bring together both the Islamic and Byzantine worlds.
Norman Palace of Palermo
📷June
#MosaicMonday #Sicily https://t.co/Ml9MsARLq7

@Prigoose Software is not as teleological instrument careening towards automation and ease, but a medium for intimacy with the matter of our time (images, audio, video), yielding a sense of agency with what, to most, feels like an indelible substrate.

@codexeditor @OGreenius @FISSIONcodes et al are pioneering edge/client side storage. Maybe we should also be thinking about client-side/federated approaches to AI implementation for more transparency. This will become more important with respect to the EU's Digital Services Act.

Persian design has a long history, with the greatest contribution to the world’s culture. The quintessential characteristic of Persian art & architecture is its eclectic nature, which has influenced design throughout much of the Islamic world\n\nA thread on Persian design & culture https://t.co/XMuMvlzAkg

html:
Seeing which other notes link to the same links in an #obsidianmd note has never been easier with @TfTHacker's new plugin: Strange New Worlds. It is really powerful in a non-intrusive, subtle way.

You can learn more on its GH page and give it a try.
https://t.co/DgZfphFWI0
